      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_622194a57e3a750909e0344524eccf257677cd35</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound propagation through vibrations in solid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichhaltige Ausbreitung durch Erschütterungen 
im Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation saine par des vibrations en solide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propagação sadia com as vibrações no sólido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Propagazione sana con le vibrazioni in solido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγιής διάδοση μέσω των δονήσεων στο στερεό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Propagación sana con vibraciones en sólido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a person far away from the source of sound would hear it through  vibrations in solids like the ground.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound propagation]</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß eine Person weit weg 
von der Quelle des Tones sie durch Erschütterungen in den Körpern 
wie dem Boden hören würde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'une personne loin 
loin de la source de bruit l'entendrait par des vibrations en solides 
comme la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que uma pessoa distante 
afastado da fonte do som a ouviria com as vibrações nos sólidos 
como a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che una persona 
lontano via dalla sorgente del suono la sentirebbe con le vibrazioni 
in solidi come la terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένα πρόσωπο μακριά 
μακρυά από την πηγή ήχου θα την άκουγε μέσω των δονήσεων στα 
στερεά όπως το έδαφος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una persona lejos 
lejos de la fuente del sonido la oiría con vibraciones en sólidos 
como la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stichhaltige Ausbreitung ]</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erschütterungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">propagation saine ]</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contínuo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propagação sadia ]</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">propagazione sana ]</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vibrazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
